name: Muse Garden
description:
A prototype/short game/interactive digital art piece I made back in spring 2019 that informed a lot of the aesthetics of a full game I made with @SomeSaltyGames on twitter! You can check out that game here: https://inspired-entertainment.itch.io/daughters-of-memory

WASD to move, shift sprint and space to jump

R resets the garden and Escape quits the game
